name: Die Die (Juancaos)
description:
Play as The Die and try not to die, as the die rolls to give you a random weapon. Play well your cards and defeat the fiend cards.

  • A random gun will be given to you ever so often.
  • Adapt to the ever-changing scenario.
  • Defeat the enemy cards.
  • Conquer one board after another.
  • Achieve Casino Glory!
  • Made in 48h for the GMTK Game Jam 2022!
Controls:
  • Move - WASD
  • Shoot - LeftMouse Button
  • Aim - Mouse
Credits:

A 48 hour Game Jam Game made by Juan C. Osorio "Juancaos" & Jaime "Crossbow_knigt"

Music by NBNBeat

& You (Die)
